meanings.definition: Play a simple, repetitive bass line in a band, especially a brass band.
meanings.sent1: The musician was oompahing on his tuba during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The band members were oompahing together, creating a lively rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The oompahing tuba player accidentally played a note too loudly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The oompahing bass line anchored the entire musical piece.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the tuba oompahing resonated through the concert hall.

meanings.definition: The act of playing a simple, repetitive bass line in a band.
meanings.sent1: The oompahing added a rich depth to the band's music.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed listening to the oompahing of the brass instruments.
meanings.sent3: The oompahing of the tuba player always made me tap my foot.
meanings.sent4: The oompahing of the band echoed through the parade route.
meanings.sent5: The oompahing of the musicians filled the air with cheerful melodies.
